Investment Portfolio
My Resume
I played hockey from when I was about 8 years old to when I graduated from high school, and I still try to occasionally play.
This is my last semester and I am on track to graduate in December.
My family consists of my mom, my dad, my brother and me.
I worked at Draper Laboratories in Cambridge a couple of semesters ago for a co-op.
I went to a boarding private high school, although I commuted there for all 4 years.
I was born in Worcester, Massachusetts.
I live in Marlborough, Massachusetts.
I have always loved going to Vermont, the scenery is so beautiful and it is just so relaxed up there.
One of my good friends is from Wisconsin.
